text: Eunice Lim was so, so help to reset all my ibanking, credit card & etc. I sincerely thank her for her patience & professionalism.

Doing my banking needs at UOB WB Centre Tampines has always been pleasant experience. All the staff there, from Reception Desk to counter staff, are friendly. Ms. Yong Rui Jing (Manager) is also very helpful. Keep up with the good work and services, Rui Jing and team.

Attended by staff named Ms Joy Yeo and Ms Rui Jing on 12-07-2024.

They both were very helpful in telling me how best to proceed with my cashier's order.

They went the extra miles to assist my corcern and escalated to the branch at Hougang to save me making another trip from Buangkok to Tampines.

Their dedication professionalism & willingness to go to the extra miles were truly commendable & made a significant positive impact on my experience.

Finally, kudos to Ms Carmen by not being selfish that willing to guide me to the website to submit the compliments for her colleagues.

Visited Wealth banking in Tampines attended by coffee lady ,counter staff & Ms Yong for new notes & some deposits before CNY. They serve me with patience. Keep it up !
Looking to visit your branch soon . Hoping to meet you all again..

Wishing all a happy & blessed Lunar New Year.
Eunice Lim is very helpful and patience. She with multiple transactions of closing accounts, transferring of cash to different accounts and online banking. It was a very pleasant visit.
